  • Method Details

    • wait

      public static void wait​(double seconds)
      Wait functionality that takes a double in seconds and converts it to milliseconds before waiting.
      Parameters:
      seconds - double number of seconds or fraction thereof (up to milliseconds) to wait.

    • wait

      public static void wait​(long duration, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)

    • out

      public static long out()
      Returns the value set in the timeout property, or a default of 10 if nothing was configured. The method unit() is used to determine how the value is measured (seconds, milliseconds, etc).
      Returns:
      long the timeout

    • unit

      public static java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit()
      Returns the timeunit property if it is set for implicit waits, otherwise returns the default TimeUnit.SECONDS. Possible return values: DAYS HOURS, MINUTES, SECONDS, MICROSECONDS, MILLISECONDS, NANOSECONDS The method out() is used to determine the duration of the timeout.
      Returns:
      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit the Time Unit
